name: the endless dance
description:
You've been dancing with her for a long time, outrunning the static. Now she has something to tell you.

Take her hand and go around again.

(This is a short interactive fiction game written for 2022's OST Jam. This game is highly dependent on sound.)

-

INSTRUCTIONS:

Click the underlined text to advance. It's better if you run it in full-screen.

-

ARTIST INFO (also in credits)

Christopher Cornell - The Big Mystery | Website link: https://www.whatmakesitokay.com/

panegoism - scaphoid condiddle

Whelp - VHS just kill me already |  Website link: https://soundcloud.com/whelp

Written by Kira Pelletier, using Twine Chapbook.
